declarations.name: ArcgisChart
declarations.description:
The ArcGIS Chart component renders various chart types based on the provided model.

Supported chart types include bar charts, line charts, pie charts, box plots, combo bar-line charts, gauges, scatterplots, histograms and radar charts.

The Chart component can be rendered using an [existing model](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/charts-components-intro/#use-an-existing-model-from-a-webmap-or-feature-layer) from a web map or feature layer,
or by [creating a new model](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/charts-components-intro/#create-a-new-model).

See also:
- [Introduction to Charts components](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/charts-components-intro/)
- [Tutorial: Display and create charts components](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/tutorials/display-and-create-charts-components/)

demos.description:
Bar Chart
Bar charts summarize and compare categorical data using proportional bar lengths to represent values.

Box Plot
Box plots visualize and compare the distribution and central tendency of numeric values through their quartiles.

Line Chart
Line charts visualize change over a continuous range, such as time or distance. They highlight overall trends and enable easy comparison of multiple data series simultaneously.

Combo Bar Line Chart
Combo bar line charts combine bar and line charts to visualize data across categories, time, or both—enabling flexible comparisons in a single view.

Gauge
Gauges visualize a single metric within a quantitative context defined by minimum and maximum values.

Histogram
Histograms visualize the distribution of a continuous numeric variable by showing the frequency of values within defined intervals.

Pie Chart
Pie charts group data into slices to visualize part-to-whole relationships, with each slice representing a category’s proportion of the total.

Scatterplot
Scatterplots visualize the relationship between two numeric variables, with one plotted along the x-axis and the other along the y-axis.

Radar Chart
Radar charts visualize multivariate data across multiple variables, with each variable represented along a separate axis arranged in a circular layout.

members.name: actionMode
members.description:
Not applicable to gauge.
Defines the cursor behavior on the chart (zoom, selection...).

members.name: autoDisposeChart
members.description: Auto-disposes the chart when a new one is created in the same container.

members.name: chartLimits
members.description:
Used to customize the number maximum of bars allowed on the chart.
The chart's behavior once that limit is reached can be adjusted through the `behaviorAfterLimit` nested property, to either reject the creation
or update of the chart, or render the elements up to the given limits.

members.name: chartWillRender
members.description:
Lifecycle function executed after the data has been processed and before the chart renders.
Can be used to alter the config from information extracted from the data for instance.

docsTags.name: remarks
docsTags.text: Applicable to gauge and pie chart only.

members.name: clearSelection
members.description: Clears all selection on the chart.

members.name: componentOnReady
members.description: Create a promise that resolves once component is fully loaded.

docsTags.name: example

members.name: componentVersion
members.description: Whether to use the stable version of the component or the beta version.

members.name: cursorRange
members.description:
Sets the cursor range:
- CursorRange.MultiAxes: allows to draw a free rectangle
- CursorRange.XAxis: allows to draw a rectangle bound to the x-axis
- CursorRange.YAxis: allows to draw a rectangle bound to the y-axis
- undefined: defaults to a preset behavior according to the chart type and action mode

docsTags.name: remarks
docsTags.text:
Not applicable to gauge.
Applies only when the action mode is set to zoom or multi-selection.

members.name: dataLabelFormatter
members.description: A callback function used to format the data labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.

type.text: (((category: string, value?: number | undefined, percent?: number | undefined, originalCategory?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string)) | (((count: number, binMinValue: number, binMaxValue: number) => string)) | (((statValue: number, percent?: number | undefined) => string)) | (((x: number, y: number, sizePolicyValue?: number | undefined) => string))

values.type: (((category: string, value?: number | undefined, percent?: number | undefined, originalCategory?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string))
(((count: number, binMinValue: number, binMaxValue: number) => string))
(((x: number, y: number, sizePolicyValue?: number | undefined) => string))

members.name: disableInteractions
members.description: Disables all interactions on the chart.

members.name: disableTogglingLegendItems
members.description: Disables the toggling of series via the legend items.

members.name: enableConfiguration
members.description: Whether to use features uniquely designed for a chart currently being configured by a user via the UI.

members.name: enableResponsiveFeatures
members.description: Enables the responsive features.

members.name: errorAlert
members.description: Triggers an alert to display an error message.

members.name: errorPolicy
members.description: Whether to display an error alert and hide the chart when it can't be created or updated.

members.name: exportAsCSV
members.description: Export the current chart's data as a CSV file.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text:
options The options to use when exporting the data.

NOTE: This method won't work for scatter plot series. The support charts for this method are:
- Bar chart
- Line chart
- Combo bar-line chart
- Box plot
- Histogram
- Pie chart

The `Options` object can contain the following properties:
- `columns` - An array of column to include in the CSV file.
- `delimiter` - The delimiter to use in the CSV file. Default is `,`.
- `includeHeader` - Whether to include the header row in the CSV file. Default is `true`.
- `quoteAll` - Whether to quote all values in the CSV file. Default is `false`.

members.name: exportAsImage
members.description: Export the current chart as an image.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: format The format of the image to download.

members.name: featureIndex
members.description:
The index of the feature to be rendered.
Only used when the gauge is a feature-based gauge.

members.name: filterByExtent
members.description: When `true`, all chart elements are filtered based on view extent.

members.name: filterBySelection
members.description: When `true`, all chart elements are filtered based on selection.

members.name: gaugeInnerLabelFormatter
members.description:
A callback function used to format the gauge inner label. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be
interpreted as such.

members.name: guideTooltipFormatter
members.description: A callback function used to format the axes guides tooltip. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.

members.name: hideEmptySeries
members.description:
When `true`, the empty series are completely hidden from the chart and the legend.
For example a series can be empty after applying a data filter, filter by attribute or geometry (as when using the filter by extent).

members.name: hideLicenseWatermark
members.description: Hides the license watermark.

members.name: hideLoaderAnimation
members.description: Hides the loader animation (curtain and spinner), showed by default at every update.

members.name: ignoreSmoothRenderingLimit
members.description:
When `true`, disables the default setting that uses debounce functions to handle the visibility of markers
that are outside of the plotting area when the min/max bound changes and/or when a zoom action is performed
(via chart cursor or scrollbar), to increase performance.
This property will be set when the chart is created and cannot be updated after that.
It's recommended that this property should only be set to true for small datasets.
When left `undefined`, will be treated as `false`.

members.name: ignoreViewExtent
members.description:
This property will be effective when the component's `view` is provided or when the `layer` is set to a FeatureLayerView.
By default the queries made by the chart will consider the view's extent as the unique geometry filter applicable. This implies ignoring any
geometry passed through the config (component.config.dataFilters) or the runtime filters (component.runtimeDataFilters).
Setting this property to `false` signals the queries to ignore the view's extent, whether an additional geometry filter is provided or not.

members.name: layer
members.description:
Used to perform queries.
If the layer is a FeatureLayerView or if the layer and the `view` property are both provided, the queries will be executed client-side.

members.name: layerFieldsChangePolicy
members.description:
Allows the chart to update automatically when the layer's fields change.
Applies when the field list (`fields`) in the feature layer is updated.

members.name: layerFilterChangePolicy
members.description: Whether the chart should be refreshed when the layer's filter (`definitionExpression`) changes.

members.name: layerRendererChangePolicy
members.description:
Allows the chart to update automatically when the layer's renderer changes.
Applies when the color match feature is enabled.

docsTags.name: remarks
docsTags.text: Even though that property is set to Ignore the chart will use the layer's renderer information when the data is updated.

members.name: legendPosition
members.description: Used to set the legend's position on the chart.

members.name: legendValueLabelFormatter
members.description:
A callback function used to format the legend value labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be
interpreted as such.
If provided, the formatter will be used if at least `WebChartPieChartLegend.displayNumericValue` or `WebChartPieChartLegend.displayPercentage` is true.

type.text: (((value?: number | undefined, percent?: number | undefined) => string))

members.name: legendVisibility
members.description: When `true`, the legend is visible on the chart.

members.name: loaderColors
members.description: Defines the colors for the loader animation.

members.name: messageOptions
members.description: Used to set the options available to handle specific messages displayed by the chart.

members.name: model
members.description:
Instance of an ArcGIS Chart Model. Provides an API to interact with the chart's configuration.

**Note:** This property has a union type of `ChartModel | WebChart` meaning a raw chart config object can be passed to it instead, however it is recommended to use a `ChartModel` instance whenever possible.

members.name: notify
members.description:
Notify method allows passing external messages to the chart component.
It can be used to pass validation or information messages.
In a situation where a config update is overriding your notification modal,
consider waiting for the `arcgisUpdateComplete` event.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: message The message to display in the notification panel.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: heading The heading to display in the notification panel.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: options The options to apply to the notification panel.

members.signature: (message?: string, heading?: string, options?: NotifyOptions): Promise<void>

members.name: placeholder
members.description: A placeholder string to provides a brief hint to the user indicating needed information for creating a chart.

members.name: queueChartCreation
members.description: Builds the charts one by one rather than all at the same time.

members.name: refresh
members.description: Re-render the chart.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: props.updateData Indicates whether to fetch new data. Default: true.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: props.updateExtent Indicates whether the view's extent is to update. Default: false.

docsTags.name: param
docsTags.text: props.resetAxesBounds Option to reset the axes bounds along with the refresh. Default: false;

members.signature: (props?: { updateData?: boolean; resetAxesBounds?: boolean; updateExtent?: boolean; }): Promise<void>

members.name: replaceNoValueCategoryWithZero
members.description:
When `true`, the chart's dataItems associated with empty (no value) categories (from only a `Count` aggregation)
will be populated with 0s, via the `completeDataForEmptyCategoriesWithZeros` method.

members.name: resetZoom
members.description: Resets the chart zoom to bring it back to full extent

members.name: returnFeaturesExtent
members.description:
When `true`, the features extent will be returned through the `arcgisDataProcessComplete` and `arcgisSelectionComplete` events payload.
Applies only to:
- charts using an aggregation
- data source using a feature layer compatible with envelope aggregation
The extent (IExtent) is returned through a property called `arcgis_charts_features_extent`.

members.name: returnSelectionIndexes
members.description: When `true`, the selection indexes will be computed whenever a selection is made on or passed to the chart.

members.name: returnSelectionOIDs
members.description:
When `true`, the object ids will be computed whenever a selection is made on or passed to the chart.
Only considered for a data source using a feature layer.

members.name: rotation
members.description:
Applicable to bar chart, line chart, combo bar-line and box plot.
When `true`, the chart is rotated 90 degrees so that the x-axis becomes vertical and the y-axis becomes horizontal.

members.name: runtimeDataFilters
members.description: Applies runtime data filters to the chart's.

members.name: secondaryYAxisLabelFormatter
members.description:
A callback function used to format the secondary y-axis labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.
The property will be effective only if 3 axes are defined (dual axis chart).

type.text: (((value: string | number | Date | null, originalValue?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string))

docsTags.name: remarks
docsTags.text: Not applicable to pie chart nor gauge.

members.name: selectionData
members.description: When this property is set, it will apply a selection on the chart matching the provided selection.

members.name: selectionTheme
members.description:
Used to provide a customized theme for the selected and non selected elements.
If no style is provided for the selected elements, a default selection is applied.
If no style is provided for the non selected elements, the chart's style is applied.

members.name: setTimeBinningInfoWhenNotProvided
members.description: When `true`, the series properties `unit` and `size` become optional and will be automatically set to values that fit the data set. Used when creating or updating a chart compatible with time binning.

docsTags.name: remarks
docsTags.text: Only applicable to charts using the temporal binning feature (bar and line chart).

members.name: switchSelection
members.description: Switches the selection on the chart.

members.name: syncSelection
members.description: Whether to synchronize the selection between chart components from the same layer.

members.name: syncSelectionsBetweenChartAndLayerViewPolicy
members.description: Determines whether the selections from the chart should be synchronized with the layer view and vice versa.

members.name: timeZone
members.description: Used to set a custom time zone for the chart.

members.name: tooltipFormatter
members.description: A callback function used to format the tooltips. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.

type.text: (((category: string, value?: number | undefined, percent?: number | undefined, originalCategory?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string)) | (((count: number, binMinValue: number, binMaxValue: number) => string)) | (((props: BarAndLineTooltipFormatCallbackProps) => string)) | (((props: BoxPlotTooltipFormatCallbackProps) => string)) | (((x: number, y: number, sizePolicyValue?: number | undefined) => string))

values.type: (((category: string, value?: number | undefined, percent?: number | undefined, originalCategory?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string))
(((count: number, binMinValue: number, binMaxValue: number) => string))
(((x: number, y: number, sizePolicyValue?: number | undefined) => string))

members.name: updateSplitBySeries
members.description:
Whether to update the series when the data updates while the chart uses a split-by field configuration.
If `addMissingSeries` is set to `true` the missing series will be added to cover the split-by values not referenced
by the config.
The default information from the property `updateSplitBySeries.seriesTemplate` will be applied to the new series.

docsTags.name: remarks
docsTags.text: Only applicable to bar chart, line chart and box plot, when they use a split-by field.

members.name: useAnimatedCharts
members.description: Enables the animations on the chart.

members.name: usePopupTemplateFieldsInfo
members.description: Allows the use of the fields alias from the layer.popupTemplate when rendering the field names on the chart (e.g. tooltips, axes, legend).

members.name: view
members.description: Used to access the LayerView instance in order to perform client-side queries.

members.name: viewTimeExtentChangePolicy
members.description:
Whether the chart should be refreshed when the view's time extent changes.
This is not currently supported on histogram. Setting the property to "refresh" won't have any effect on that chart.

members.name: xAxisLabelFormatter
members.description:
Indicates whether to show the ArcGIS charts notify panel. False by default
A callback function used to format the x-axis labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.

type.text: (((value: string | number | Date | null, originalValue?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string))

members.name: yAxisLabelFormatter
members.description: A callback function used to format the y-axis labels. If the returned string contains HTML tags they will be interpreted as such.

type.text: (((value: string | number | Date | null, originalValue?: WebChartDataItemValue) => string))

docsTags.name: remarks
docsTags.text: Not applicable to pie chart nor gauge.

attributes.name: action-mode
attributes.description:
Not applicable to gauge.
Defines the cursor behavior on the chart (zoom, selection...).

attributes.name: auto-dispose-chart
attributes.description: Auto-disposes the chart when a new one is created in the same container.

attributes.name: component-version
attributes.description: Whether to use the stable version of the component or the beta version.

attributes.name: cursor-range
attributes.description:
Sets the cursor range:
- CursorRange.MultiAxes: allows to draw a free rectangle
- CursorRange.XAxis: allows to draw a rectangle bound to the x-axis
- CursorRange.YAxis: allows to draw a rectangle bound to the y-axis
- undefined: defaults to a preset behavior according to the chart type and action mode

attributes.description: Disables all interactions on the chart.

attributes.description: Whether to display an error alert and hide the chart when it can't be created or updated.

attributes.name: feature-index
attributes.description:
The index of the feature to be rendered.
Only used when the gauge is a feature-based gauge.

attributes.name: filter-by-extent
attributes.description: When `true`, all chart elements are filtered based on view extent.

attributes.name: filter-by-selection
attributes.description: When `true`, all chart elements are filtered based on selection.

attributes.name: hide-empty-series
attributes.description:
When `true`, the empty series are completely hidden from the chart and the legend.
For example a series can be empty after applying a data filter, filter by attribute or geometry (as when using the filter by extent).

attributes.name: hide-license-watermark
attributes.description: Hides the license watermark.

attributes.name: hide-loader-animation
attributes.description: Hides the loader animation (curtain and spinner), showed by default at every update.

attributes.name: ignore-smooth-rendering-limit
attributes.description:
When `true`, disables the default setting that uses debounce functions to handle the visibility of markers
that are outside of the plotting area when the min/max bound changes and/or when a zoom action is performed
(via chart cursor or scrollbar), to increase performance.
This property will be set when the chart is created and cannot be updated after that.
It's recommended that this property should only be set to true for small datasets.
When left `undefined`, will be treated as `false`.

attributes.name: ignore-view-extent
attributes.description:
This property will be effective when the component's `view` is provided or when the `layer` is set to a FeatureLayerView.
By default the queries made by the chart will consider the view's extent as the unique geometry filter applicable. This implies ignoring any
geometry passed through the config (component.config.dataFilters) or the runtime filters (component.runtimeDataFilters).
Setting this property to `false` signals the queries to ignore the view's extent, whether an additional geometry filter is provided or not.

attributes.name: layer-fields-change-policy
attributes.description:
Allows the chart to update automatically when the layer's fields change.
Applies when the field list (`fields`) in the feature layer is updated.

attributes.name: layer-filter-change-policy
attributes.description: Whether the chart should be refreshed when the layer's filter (`definitionExpression`) changes.

attributes.name: layer-renderer-change-policy
attributes.description:
Allows the chart to update automatically when the layer's renderer changes.
Applies when the color match feature is enabled.

attributes.name: legend-position
attributes.description: Used to set the legend's position on the chart.

attributes.name: legend-visibility
attributes.description: When `true`, the legend is visible on the chart.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.description: A placeholder string to provides a brief hint to the user indicating needed information for creating a chart.

attributes.name: queue-chart-creation
attributes.description: Builds the charts one by one rather than all at the same time.

attributes.name: replace-no-value-category-with-zero
attributes.description:
When `true`, the chart's dataItems associated with empty (no value) categories (from only a `Count` aggregation)
will be populated with 0s, via the `completeDataForEmptyCategoriesWithZeros` method.

attributes.name: return-features-extent
attributes.description:
When `true`, the features extent will be returned through the `arcgisDataProcessComplete` and `arcgisSelectionComplete` events payload.
Applies only to:
- charts using an aggregation
- data source using a feature layer compatible with envelope aggregation
The extent (IExtent) is returned through a property called `arcgis_charts_features_extent`.

attributes.name: return-selection-indexes
attributes.description: When `true`, the selection indexes will be computed whenever a selection is made on or passed to the chart.

attributes.name: return-selection-oi-ds
attributes.description:
When `true`, the object ids will be computed whenever a selection is made on or passed to the chart.
Only considered for a data source using a feature layer.

attributes.name: rotation
attributes.description:
Applicable to bar chart, line chart, combo bar-line and box plot.
When `true`, the chart is rotated 90 degrees so that the x-axis becomes vertical and the y-axis becomes horizontal.

attributes.name: set-time-binning-info-when-not-provided
attributes.description: When `true`, the series properties `unit` and `size` become optional and will be automatically set to values that fit the data set. Used when creating or updating a chart compatible with time binning.

attributes.name: sync-selection
attributes.description: Whether to synchronize the selection between chart components from the same layer.

attributes.name: sync-selections-between-chart-and-layer-view-policy
attributes.description: Determines whether the selections from the chart should be synchronized with the layer view and vice versa.

attributes.name: time-zone
attributes.description: Used to set a custom time zone for the chart.

attributes.name: use-animated-charts
attributes.description: Enables the animations on the chart.

attributes.name: use-popup-template-fields-info
attributes.description: Allows the use of the fields alias from the layer.popupTemplate when rendering the field names on the chart (e.g. tooltips, axes, legend).

attributes.name: view-time-extent-change-policy
attributes.description:
Whether the chart should be refreshed when the view's time extent changes.
This is not currently supported on histogram. Setting the property to "refresh" won't have any effect on that chart.

events.name: arcgisAxesMinMaxChange
events.description: Event triggered once the chart axes min/max values are computed

events.name: arcgisBadDataWarningRaise
events.description: Event triggered when an error is detected with the data set

events.name: arcgisConfigChange
events.description: Event triggered when the chart config is changed

events.name: arcgisDataFetchComplete
events.description:
Event triggered once the chart data has been fetched but not yet fully processed.
For instance it can be useful for a pie chart to see all the slices before they get grouped into an 'other' slice during the post-processing step.

events.name: arcgisDataProcessComplete
events.description: Event triggered once the chart data has been processed

events.name: arcgisDataProcessError
events.description: Event triggered when an error occurred while fetching of processing the data for the chart

events.name: arcgisLegendItemVisibilityChange
events.description: Event triggered once a legend item visibility has been changed

events.name: arcgisNoRenderPropChange
events.description: Event triggered when a no-render prop is changed

events.name: arcgisRuntimeError
events.description: Event triggered when an error occurred that prevents the chart from being created or updated

events.name: arcgisSelectionComplete
events.description: Event triggered when a selection is applied to the chart

events.name: arcgisSeriesColorChange
events.description: Event triggered once the chart series color have been assigned

events.name: arcgisSeriesOrder
events.description: Event carrying the series id as they have been sorted following the `orderOptions` instructions

events.name: arcgisUpdateComplete
events.description: Event triggered once the chart is updated

slots.name: action-bar
slots.description: Slot for adding a `charts-action-bar` component or `calcite-action-bar`.

declarations.name: ArcgisChartsActionBar
declarations.description:
The ArcGIS charts action bar component enhances chart functionality by offering context-specific actions such as rotation, zooming, and filtering.
It also supports general actions like exporting the chart as an image or CSV.
This component is designed to be used with a chart component and is not intended for standalone use.

See also:
- [Tutorial: Charts components with Map components using charts action bar](https://developers.arcgis.com/javascript/latest/tutorials/charts-components-with-map-components/)

demos.description:
Charts Action Bar
The charts action bar component renders a set of buttons based on the chart type, offering optional tools to enhance chart functionality.

members.name: actionBarSelectionMode
members.description: Action bar selection mode. Defines which selection mode the slotted action bar should use.

members.name: chartElement
members.description: Chart element reference with which the action bar is associated.

members.name: chartType
members.description: Chart type used to determine which default actions to display.

members.name: clearSelectionState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the clear selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: clearSelectionTitle
members.description: Custom title for the clear selection action.

members.name: clearSelectionToggle
members.description: When active, the clear selection action is highlighted.

members.name: componentOnReady
members.description: Create a promise that resolves once component is fully loaded.

docsTags.name: example

members.name: disableCSVExportForChartTypes
members.description:
The CSV export action is disabled for certain chart types.

Modify this property to add or remove chart types from the list of disabled types.

members.name: disabledExportAction
members.description: When `true`, the export action is disabled.

members.name: editChartState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the edit chart action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: editChartTitle
members.description: Custom title for the edit chart action.

members.name: editChartToggle
members.description: When active, the edit chart action is highlighted.

members.name: expanded
members.description: When `true`, the action bar is expanded.

members.name: exportAsCSVState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the download CSV is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: exportAsCSVTitle
members.description: Custom title for the download CSV action.

members.name: exportAsImageState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the download image is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: exportAsImageTitle
members.description: Custom title for the download chart action.

members.name: filterByExtentState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the filter by extent action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: filterByExtentTitle
members.description: Custom title for the filter by extent action.

members.name: filterByExtentToggle
members.description: When active, the filter by extent action is highlighted.

members.name: filterBySelectionState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the filter by selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: filterBySelectionTitle
members.description: Custom title for the filter by selection action.

members.name: filterBySelectionToggle
members.description: When active, the filter by selection action is highlighted.

members.name: forceDisableActions
members.description: When `true`, overrides the individual settings for each action to instead force disable them all.

members.name: fullExtentState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the full extent action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: fullExtentTitle
members.description: Custom title for the full extent action.

members.name: fullExtentToggle
members.description: When active, the full extent action is highlighted.

members.name: hiddenActions
members.description:
Holds a list of actions to hide from the action bar.

**Note:** The edit chart action is hidden by default. To show it, remove its value from this array.

members.name: legendState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the legend action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: legendTitle
members.description: Custom title for the legend action.

members.name: legendToggle
members.description: When active, the legend action is highlighted.

members.name: messageOverrides
members.description: Overwrite localized strings for this component

members.name: rotateChartState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the rotate chart action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: rotateChartTitle
members.description: Custom title for the rotate chart action.

members.name: rotateChartToggle
members.description: When active, the rotate chart action is highlighted.

members.name: selectionState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: selectionTitle
members.description: Custom title for the selection action.

members.name: selectionToggle
members.description: When active, the selection action is highlighted.

members.name: switchSelectionState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the switch selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: switchSelectionTitle
members.description: Custom title for the switch selection action.

members.name: switchSelectionToggle
members.description: When active, the switch selection action is highlighted.

members.name: zoomState
members.description: When disabled, interaction with the zoom action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

members.name: zoomTitle
members.description: Custom title for the zoom action.

members.name: zoomToggle
members.description: When active, the zoom action is highlighted.

attributes.name: action-bar-selection-mode
attributes.description: Action bar selection mode. Defines which selection mode the slotted action bar should use.

attributes.name: chart-type
attributes.description: Chart type used to determine which default actions to display.

attributes.name: clear-selection-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the clear selection action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: clear-selection-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the clear selection action.

attributes.name: clear-selection-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the clear selection action is highlighted.

attributes.name: disabled-export-action
attributes.description: When `true`, the export action is disabled.

attributes.name: edit-chart-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the edit chart action is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: edit-chart-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the edit chart action.

attributes.name: edit-chart-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the edit chart action is highlighted.

attributes.name: expanded
attributes.description: When `true`, the action bar is expanded.

attributes.name: export-as-csv-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the download CSV is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: export-as-csv-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the download CSV action.

attributes.name: export-as-image-state
attributes.description: When disabled, interaction with the download image is prevented and the component is displayed with lower opacity.

attributes.name: export-as-image-title
attributes.description: Custom title for the download chart action.

attributes.name: filter-by-extent-state

attributes.name: filter-by-selection-toggle
attributes.description: When active, the filter by selection action is highlighted.

attributes.name: force-disable-actions
attributes.description: When `true`, overrides the individual settings for each action to instead force disable them all.

attributes.name: full-extent-state

attributes.description: When active, the rotate chart action is highlighted.
